'''1.5.1 Build 11''' is the eleventh build for {{El|MinecraftEdu}} 1.5.1, released in 2013. It is based on [[Java Edition 1.5.1]].

== Changes ==
=== Blocks ===
'''[[File:Teleport block.png|width=32x32]] [[Teleport Block]]'''
* Teleport 2 blocks above to allow Teleport Block placing underground.

== Fixes ==
'''4 bugs fixed'''
* [[Information block]] links no longer makes the whole row a link.
* Pasting from one page to another in Information block now works.
* Client give did not find any items after first give.
* Fixed updater always saying "there are newer versions available" even if there were.
